brand.description: The brand to be used for the content. Depending on the brand, this may override the UHF header. Not required. Example: azure

breadcrumb_path.description: The absolute URL or relative location (relative to the context file) to use for the breadcrumb path file. Overrides the docset value. Example: ./powershell/breadcrumb.json

chromeless.description: Whether or not to use chromeless rendering. Only used for Hands-On Learning tutorials.

searchScope.description: A list of the search scopes to use with the content.

toc_rel.description: The absolute URL or relative location (relative to the context file) to use for the table of contents file. Overrides the docset value. Example: ../toc.yml

uhfheaderId.description: The UHFHeaderID to use for the content. Overrides the default docset value. Example: MSDocsHeader-Dynamics365
